blogPost.title: What's your definition of a great article and story? Answer by @JanetFitch323, author of White Oleander. https://t.co/EevDMz16el https://t.co/pmRdcQ31ZB
blogPost.author: Quora

localize.full_text: あなたが考える素晴らしい記事やストーリーの定義は何ですか？回答者：@JanetFitch323（『White Oleander』の著者） https://t.co/EevDMz16el https://t.co/pmRdcQ31ZB
你对一篇好文章和故事的定义是什么？回答者：@JanetFitch323，《白色夹竹桃》作者。https://t.co/EevDMz16el https://t.co/pmRdcQ31ZB
你對一篇好文章和故事的定義是什麼？回答者：@JanetFitch323，《白色夾竹桃》作者。https://t.co/EevDMz16el https://t.co/pmRdcQ31ZB

previous.title: How do I apply top leadership lessons to home life during COVID-19? Answer by @alyssawestring, Author of Parents Who Lead. Associate Professor of Management @DePaulU. https://t.co/z7iGgVifk4 https://t.co/Ru519CVtdX

localize.full_text: COVID-19でリーダーシップのトップレッスンを家庭生活に生かすには？回答者：@alyssawestring（『Parents Who Lead』の著者。経営学の准教授 @DePaulU. https://t.co/z7iGgVifk4 https://t.co/Ru519CVtdX
在COVID-19期间，我如何将顶级领导力课程应用于家庭生活？回答者：@alyssawestring, Parents Who Lead一书的作者。管理学副教授 @DePaulU. https://t.co/z7iGgVifk4 https://t.co/Ru519CVtdX
在COVID-19期間，我如何將頂級領導力課程應用於家庭生活？回答者：@alyssawestring, Parents Who Lead一書的作者。管理學副教授 @DePaulU. https://t.co/z7iGgVifk4 https://t.co/Ru519CVtdX

next.title: What does a typical day in the life of a VC look like? Answer by @BKartRed, Co-Founder @BlumeVentures. https://t.co/pyjo1cMncW https://t.co/hkHNmTdXsI

localize.full_text: VCの典型的な一日とはどのようなものでしょうか？Answer by @BKartRed, Co-Founder @BlumeVentures. https://t.co/pyjo1cMncW https://t.co/hkHNmTdXsI
风险投资人生活中的典型一天是什么样子的？由@BKartRed，联合创始人@BlumeVentures回答。https://t.co/pyjo1cMncW https://t.co/hkHNmTdXsI
風險投資人生活中的典型一天是什麼樣子的？由@BKartRed，聯合創始人@BlumeVentures回答。https://t.co/pyjo1cMncW https://t.co/hkHNmTdXsI
